name: WASTE
nutshell: In a post nuclear holocaust world,it has become a truly sinister dog-eat-dog world where only the strong survive. few humans are left and are easy pickings for mutated creatures but now here comes the mutated humans…

name: Nisekoi Doumei.
nutshell: Aizawa-kun is my fake boyfriend, my partner in our sweet, secret crime. One fateful day, in a classroom after school, we saw his girlfriend and my boyfriend stabbing us both in the back. That’s where our relationship as co-conspirators started. As an imitation of theirs. Our relationship is sweet, but painful. Within the lie, I feel a twinge in my heart from my true feelings. This is our love story.

name: Ghost Gate
tags: Thriller,Ghosts,Long Strip,Boys' Love,Office Workers,Drama,Horror,Web Comic,Mystery,Full Color
nutshell:
After staying behind in the office to work overtime, Giyoon accidentally spots Director Jung Yitae masturbating in the empty office. Disturbed by the immoral sight, he tries to leave. But an unknown force draws him closer to the man he does not get along with. After resolving to take a video of the director's unpleasant acts, the director catches him in the act and turns the situation against him.
But, is this person really Director Jung Yitae?
A dark and twisted relationship begins.

name: Bokura no Q
nutshell: People are becoming possessed by a strange orb, but why? What fate does this mysterious object have in store for the world?

name: Kimi no Na wa. - Okashii Onee-chan (Doujinshi)
Touhou - Nazrin and the Red-Color Café (Doujinshi)
Touhou - Kappa-Squad
nutshell: This is a German doujinshi based on ZUNs Touhou series. It follows the adventures of four kappa from the Genbu Ravine that deal with living in Nitori Kawashiro’s shadow.

name: Cultivation Psychologist
nutshell: This year the cultivation realm isn't having much of a good time, either. Everyone's under a ton of pressure; A bit of bipolar over here, a little pre-ascention anxiety over there, even the elders are going schitzophrenic due to all the intense training! A modern psychologist gets transmigrated to the most depressing of all sects into the body of Xun Cai, the senior disciple whose body yin and yang are all sorts of 'wrong', and begins to treat the OCD Brother Lin Cong and his fellow disciples. And so, filled with love, the daily life of a chilled out cultivator begins!

name: Vang Vang's Silly Adventures
tags: Long Strip,Comedy,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color

name: Kozure Ookami
nutshell: On the same day, two men, each divorced and with a child, moved into the top and bottom of an apartment building. Facing the same circumstances, they hit it off right away, and found themselves in a relationship visiting each others' homes often. But one night, due to a situation blamed on alcohol, their friendship took a perilous turn?!

name: Rinjin-chan ga Shinpai
tags: Monsters,Office Workers,Magic,4-Koma,Fantasy,Monster Girls,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Supernatural
nutshell:
Yano Maya, an office worker tired of work and seeking healing, met a naïve and weak God “Rinjin-chan.” This is her daily life with a God, being gently swung around and healed.
Note: 'Rinjin' is a pun on '隣人' (neighbor), replacing the kanji for 'person/人' with 'god/神'.

name: The Only One Who Didn't Know
nutshell: Pyo Min is your average hetero dude in college: he likes his meat, never really has any money, and he really likes girls. Until he meets Jisoo, that is. After a night of too many drinks, he realizes that not only does he have it in him to sleep with the same sex, he…really likes it. But the deeper and deeper he finds his emotions for Jisoo become…the further Jisoo pulls away… What secret is Jisoo hiding?

name: Castle of Dawn
nutshell:
Midorimaru Matsunoki, the only son of lord Matsunoki Mumeharu, retainer of Hideyoshi Toyotomi, becomes involved in his father's secret plans about construction of a new castle. Soon after encounters a female peasant school teacher, Tae, who becomes his lover. Circumstances even come to affect the beautiful female noble Yayoi, who hates (and loves) him, and his beloved sensei, samurai Fujinosuke Murasaki, the main constructer of the castle, in ways no one would have anticipated…
This is a fast-paced story with overt characterization that reflects on the fairness of love and war.

Volume 50 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: New Model Android
nutshell: While two co-workers talk about the newer model androids coming out, the male co-worker realised he's in love with the female co-worker, who he believes is an android.

name: Majo to Kishi wa Iki nokoru
nutshell:
A fantasy about a knight who lost everything and his story of survival strategy and territory restoration!
One day, when the lord's son, Agredios, came back to the village after a long hunt, the sounds of villagers bustling and their laughter were all gone. After learning that the "witch" that lives in the "Forbidden Forest" was the cause of their demise, his despair turned to rage and he stormed into the forest for revenge alone.


Licensed in English by Yen Press - no release date yet

name: Namekawa-san Won't Be Bullied
nutshell: A bullied middle school girl makes her highschool debut as a delinquent! But then she catches the eye of the head of the disciplinary committee…

name: Fukenzen Host ni Kimajime JK
nutshell: A story about a high schooler who for some reason is able to work in her school uniform at a host club despite being underage all the while being sexually harassed by grown men.

name: Junkoku no Alpha
nutshell:
The French Revolution, which started with the king, sent many citizens to the guillotine, "exporting" the momentum of democratization to countries around the world - marking a turning point in history. But underneath the surface, there was another world that none were aware of... 18th century France—this was a time where the world's royalty, nobility, and commoners were separated into a 3-tier system, α (alpha), β (beta), and Ω (omega).
King Louis XVI was known as the "dim-witted α." Queen Marie Antoinette, who married in from a neighboring country in a political marriage, was ridiculed as the "lustful Ω." Then there was a certain girl who held a grudge against the royal family... Seeking, hating, deceiving... A swirling conspiracy emerged, catching everyone in a revolutionary storm!
(Source: Shogakukan, translated)

name: Paris~Tokyo
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
An undiscovered gem, quietly left behind by a master of maiden drawings in Osaka's Hinomaru Bunko, the birthplace of gekiga! Flower-selling girls, longing for Paris, and the "golden rule of girls' manga" (Yoraba Takemoto), essential to every girl's dream!
The e-book version does not include "Paris - Tokyo" and "Sakura Namiki" (a separate volume of interviews, commentaries, and conversations).

name: The Saintess Returns as a Villain
nutshell: Beatrice has lived as a saint for 10 years to prevent the disaster of the empire and win the love of her family. One day, her place as a saint was taken away by a girl named Lina Cumbell with her black hair... “I will kill you, your family, and all your followers.” She is framed as a warlock and executed. Beatrice's second life began like that. “Even if this life becomes a villainess… Lina, I will avenge you!!” The new life of Riche, a true saint who decided to become a villain, is redrawn.

name: My Blood and Soul to You
nutshell:
Fellatio in the bathroom and a wild night of sex after clubbing? What more could anyone ask for?
Well, a meal for starters. For a vampire like Bokhee, that'd be blood from a living human. Too bad he hooked up with Mariam, an undead demon. So, what do you get when you combine unquenchable thirst and deviant appetites?
By the author of The Baker on the First Floor.

name: Kanojotachi no Saishuu Teiri
nutshell: Haizawa is the cool kid in school. He's naturally good looking and has quick thinking. It all starts when he accidentally finds a spot on campus that lets you see up girls' skirts. First, he has a sexual encounter with the school’s most popular girl, Kuroha Ageha, after learning that her big crush is him. Next, even the young and beautiful science teacher, Ms. Shiromine, falls victim to Haizawa’s sexual aura that's starting to grow stronger.

name: Futari Solo Camp
nutshell: Kinokura Gen loves camping solo. He enjoys the quiet solitude away from the hustle and bustle of the city, and being able to appreciate nature all by himself. But on one camping trip, his solitude is broken by the appearance of Kusano Shizuku, a young woman who wanted to go solo camping by herself, but is ill-prepared and completely out of her league. While he tries to to get her to go home so he can camp in peace, she refuses, and stubbornly insists on accompanying him on future camping trips until she's ready to camp solo. Thus Gen and Shizuku's days of solo camping together begin.

name: The Girl's Winter
nutshell: Girl contemplates the possibility of suicide, and from there everything goes wrong.

name: Renai Prism
nutshell: Hiroto Kahara can see the auras of people since childhood. He has learned to hide his gift so his life would not be affected.

name: Blossom Days
tags: Psychological,Long Strip,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell:
Ji Won is a new Korean literature teacher. High school student Sanha has been her neighbor for many years. To a student, school is his life. But to a teacher, school is just a workplace. They thought that not much would change, but reality begs to differ...



Original Webtoon <BookCube>


Original Webtoon <Bomtoon>


Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>


Original Webtoon <Naver>


Original Webtoon <kakao>

name: Probe
nutshell: There is a monster who lives in the deep woods and eats people. One day, the monster, missing a family member, meets a woman who is lost in the forest. Believing the woman to be like their mother, the monster has a plan to keep her near…

name: Hatsujou Kemono Biyori
nutshell: In the third district of a certain town, there are only male cats. Rikuo, a smaller cat, has been the alpha leader of the turf for a long time. Even though most of the cats have left the third district as they got older, Rikuo's been a very reliable leader who's protected the area from invading cats. Toraji, a cat that Rikuo found abandoned as a kitten, has challenged Rikuo for the alpha leader's position. Will Toraji, who just turned into an adult, be able to get Rikuo on his knees…? Another story included is about Kuro, who has a serious problem as a male cat, and Ao, a house cat who knows nothing about his own physical needs and issues. (from Renta!)
